00085 template <class Object>
00086 Object* CMultiModelDispatcherBase::GetObjectAt(int modelId) const
00087 {
00088        typename ModelMap::const_iterator foundIter = m_modelMap.find(modelId);
00089        if ((foundIter != m_modelMap.end()) && foundIter->second.IsValid()){
00090               return dynamic_cast<Object*>(foundIter->second->GetModelPtr());
00091        }
00092 
00093        return NULL;
00094 }
